mapper.select: SELECT SUM(A.TOTAL_ORDER) totalOrder, SUM(A.SUCCEED_ORDER) succeedOrder, SUM(A.FAILED_ORDER) failedOrder, SUM(A.SALE_AMOUNT) saleAmount, SUM(A.COST_AMOUNT) costAmount, SUM(A.ADVERT_AMOUNT) advertAmount, SUM(A.SERVICE_AMOUNT) serviceAmount, SUM(A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT) virtualAmount FROM SHOP_SALES A,USER_SHOP S WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' AND A.SHOP_ID=S.SHOP_ID GROUP BY A.USER_ID

SELECT S.SHOP_ID shopId, S.SHOP_NAME shopName, S.SHOP_TYPE shopType, A.RETAINED_PROFITS retainedProfits, A.RETAINED_PROFITS_RATE retainedProfitsRate, A.GROSS_PROFIT grossProfit, A.GROSS_PROFIT_RATE grossProfitRate, A.TOTAL_ORDER totalOrder, A.SUCCEED_ORDER succeedOrder, A.FAILED_ORDER failedOrder, A.SALE_AMOUNT saleAmount, A.COST_AMOUNT costAmount, A.ADVERT_AMOUNT advertAmount, A.SERVICE_AMOUNT serviceAmount, A.VIRTUAL_AMOUNT virtualAmount, A.TOTAL_COST totalCost FROM USER_SHOP S LEFT JOIN SHOP_SALES A ON A.SHOP_ID=S.SHOP_ID WHERE S.USER_ID = #{obj.userId} AND S.SHOP_STATE='1'
AND S.SHOP_ID = #{obj.shopId}
AND S.SHOP_NAME LIKE #{obj.shopName}"%"
AND S.SHOP_TYPE LIKE #{obj.shopType}"%"
ORDER BY S.SHOP_ID ASC
